title: Decorative font
content:
Long time no see! Resuming my design activities... I need to pick up a work in the middle of the process with no open files and no fonts and with previous designer literally disappeared. Could use some help here...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413im_/http:/typophile.com/files/marianne_6685.jpg)
  
Anyone?  
:)
author: marco nascimento

comments.content:
I don't know what that typeface is exactly but [Post Industrial](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/typeart/post-industrial/) is similar

and Neville Brody has designed a few typefaces with similar characteristics. This typeface might be inspired by  
 [Tokyo One](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413/http:/www.identifont.com/show?2NF) or [World One](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413/http:/www.identifont.com/show?1DT)

———————————————————-  
 [Read Between the Leading podcast](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413/http:/rbtl.us/) | [Pixelspread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022413/http:/pixelspread.com/)
Thanks man. I'll try to go from there.
